description: This file defines and configures an AI agent with storage capabilities, including setting up knowledge base, storage, and agent parameters. It includes class instantiations, path setup, and agent behavior configuration.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Main class representing the AI agent with capabilities for knowledge, storage, and interaction.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Class for managing knowledge base from URLs with vector database integration.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: Vector database class for LanceDB integration.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: Enumeration for search types in LanceDb.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Class for managing session storage in SQLite database.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI chat models.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base into the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given prompt.
